chau_dara_quote: It all begins with a passion.
tfd_mission: TFD(Teaching For Devs) is a new initiative aiming at bringing uncovered facts that people might not be aware of to the public. This initiative also hopes to inspire scientific ways of thinking with logic and comprehensive analysis.
cookies_description: We use our own cookies and third-party cookies so that we can show you this website and better understand how you use it, with a view to improving the services we offer.
